text:
Amir Ohana, Hebrew: אמיר אוחנה‎‎, (born March 15, 1976 in Beer Sheba) is an Israeli politician and lawyer. Previously he worked at Shin Bet (internal intelligence agency of Israel).
Ohana is a Member of Knesset for Likud since 2015. He is the first openly gay MK for his party.
Since 2019 he had been justice minister in the Fourth Netanyahu Government, and since May 17, 2020 he has been minister of internal security in the Fifth Netanyahu Government.
